description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Try to leave Hell avoiding the traps which are bound to make you lose lives! Playing with another gamer in co-op mode, you will be able to win lives, which will make your task easier … But will you succeed?  More than 30 levels, 2 multiplayer modes and 2 single modes"!
description.short: Try to leave Hell avoiding the traps which are bound to make you lose lives! Playing with another gamer in co-op mode, you will be able to win lives, which will make your task easier … But will you succeed?  More than 30 levels, 2 multiplayer modes and 2 single modes"!
